verse.plotter.plotter2D.reachtube_tree_single

verse.plotter.plotter2D.reachtube_tree_single(root: AnalysisTree | AnalysisTreeNode, agent_id, fig=Figure({'data': [], 'layout': {'template': '...'}}), x_dim: int = 1, y_dim: int = 2, color=None, print_dim_list=None, combine_rect=1, plot_color=None)

It statically shows the verfication traces of one given agent.
